title: ETA RAGGIO
description:
ETA Raggio is the official application for robot vacuum cleaner ETA5225 with various functions.

Main features:
- control the robot with smart device
- Intelligent scheduled cleaning - choose a day, time and zone of cleaning
- up to 10 cleaning zones and restricted areas 
- detailed map of cleaning room
- distance control even outside your home
- monitor current operation and cleaning history
- up to 10 accounts to be paired with one robot
- cleaning modes: auto, zone, spot
- robot maintenance notifications (replace filters, side brush, main brush etc.)
- Errors diagnostic
- virtual remote control
- do not disturb function
- 3 levels of suction power
